Package org.apache.edgent.samples.connectors.kafka

Samples showing use of the Apache Kafka stream connector.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KafkaClient
    Demonstrate integrating with the Apache Kafka messaging system http://kafka.apache.org.
    PublisherApp
    A Kafka producer/publisher topology application.
    Runner
    Build and run the publisher or subscriber application.
    SimplePublisherApp
    A simple Kafka publisher topology application.
    SimpleSubscriberApp
    A simple Kafka subscriber topology application.
    SubscriberApp
    A Kafka consumer/subscriber topology application.

Package org.apache.edgent.samples.connectors.kafka Description

Samples showing use of the Apache Kafka stream connector.

See <edgent-release>/scripts/connectors/kafka/README to run the samples.

The following simple samples are provided:

  • SimplePublisherApp.java - a simple publisher application topology
  • SimpleSubscriberApp.java - a simple subscriber application topology
The remaining classes are part of a sample that more fully exposes controlling various configuration options.
